Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: Create a script to run pte daily tests in CI using cello and ATD
Issue.description: Automate the pte daily tests to run in CI using cello/ATD. Create another script inside fabric-test/regression/daily/ for this (which will be our new chosen alternative to runDailyPteTestSuite.sh). We may need to edit the fabric-test/Makefile as well, to execute this script.
